item.title: CVE-2021-24394|2024-08-03T19:28:23.853Z -- unknown -- easy%20testimonial%20manager
item.description: An id GET parameter of the Easy Testimonial Manager WordPress plugin through 1.2.0 is not sanitised, escaped or validated before inserting to a SQL statement, leading to SQL injection
